hero.description: Frontend developer specializing in React, Next.js, and TypeScript. I craft high-performance, visually refined interfaces with smooth animations and modern designâ€”turning vision into pixel-perfect reality.

about.title: How I Build Frontend Experiences
about.description: My toolkit combines modern frameworks, strategic libraries, and best practices to deliver fast, beautiful, and accessible user interfaces.

expertise.performanceDesc: Optimizing Core Web Vitals, lazy loading, and efficient state management for lightning-fast experiences.
expertise.accessibilityDesc: Building WCAG-compliant interfaces with semantic HTML and ARIA attributes for inclusive design.
expertise.designDesc: Translating designs into pixel-perfect implementations with attention to micro-interactions and details.

timeline.title: Professional Journey
timeline.description: Crafting digital experiences with precision and passion. Each role shaped my expertise and approach.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.description: Showcasing my best work across different domains and technologies. Each project demonstrates my commitment to quality and innovation.

values.title: Why Clients Choose Me
values.description: Combining technical excellence with strategic thinking to deliver results that exceed expectations.
values.performanceFirstDesc: Every pixel optimized for speed. I prioritize Core Web Vitals and efficient code to ensure lightning-fast user experiences.
values.accessibilityDesc: Building inclusive interfaces that work for everyone. WCAG 2.1 AA compliant with semantic HTML and proper ARIA implementation.
values.pixelPerfectDesc: Meticulous attention to design details. Every interaction, animation, and visual element refined to perfection.
values.userFocusedDesc: Understanding user needs drives my design decisions. I create intuitive interfaces that delight and engage.
values.scalabilityDesc: Building systems that grow. Clean architecture and component design ready for future expansion and maintenance.
values.innovationDesc: Staying ahead with latest technologies. Always exploring new tools and techniques to improve my craft.

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.description: Ready to bring your vision to life? I'm excited to discuss your project and explore how we can create something remarkable together.
contact.available: Available for freelance projects and consulting work
contact.upworkNote: Also available on Upwork for ongoing collaboration
